section.para: The ngx_http_sub_module module is a filter that modifies a response by replacing one specified string by another.
This module is not built by default, it should be enabled with the --with-http_sub_module configuration parameter.

directive.name: sub_filter
directive.para: Sets a string that needs to be changed, and a replacement string. The string to be replaced is matched ignoring the case. A replacement string can contain variables.

directive.name: sub_filter_once
directive.para: Determines how many times to look for a string to be replaced, once or several times.

directive.name: sub_filter_types
directive.para: Enables string replacement in responses with the specified MIME types in addition to “text/html”. The special value “*” matches any MIME type (0.8.29).
